page.title: 04Pastimes
page.content: At school we play many games such as netball,football,bakers,bulldogs,spot and chain-tiggy.In the evening some children play on the adventure playground at the side of the football pitch.At the church some of us go bell-ringing. At home many people enjoy watching television and listening to the radio Some prefer the pubs in Gedney Hill like the Red Lion or the Duke's Head or perhaps The Old Golden Ball.In the pubs some people like playing pool,snooker,darts and dominoes.There is also a bowling green in the village so a few people play bowls in their spare time. Many people enjoy fishing in the rivers and streams as well.There are two adult football teams in the Peteborough league.We have a school football team and a netball team.
